docs.title: Hi, I'm Jovan Gash
docs.text:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate | IT Professional Specializing in Cost Savings and Operational Excellence

Terraform | AWS | CI/CD Automation | Python Programmer

jovan@jovangash.com | LinkedIn | GitHub | Resume

docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
I’m an AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate with over a decade of IT experience and a growing track record of delivering cloud-based solutions that improve performance, security, and user experience.

I’m passionate about cost savings and operational excellence. That's where cloud infrastructure and automation pique my interest. As such, I enjoy coding with Python and building multi-tier AWS infrastructure using Terraform to automate deployments, as part of my ongoing self-study.

docs.title: Skills & Tools
docs.text:
• AWS (EC2, S3, VPC, CloudFront, Route 53)
  • Terraform
  • Python, Bash
  • CloudWatch, SNS

docs.title: Static Website Hosted on S3
docs.text: • Hosted a static website on Amazon S3, configured a S3 bucket for public access. Enabled static website hosting, applied appropriate bucket policies for security, and deployed the site via the S3 endpoint.

docs.title: Personal Portfolio Website & Blog Hosted on EC2 Instance
docs.text: • Created a public website hosted on an EC2 instance. Used Amazon Linux and configured the LAMP stack. Setup SSL certificate. Used Route53 to route traffic to an assigned Elastic IP. Configured monitoring with CloudWatch and configured alarms with SNS text notifications.

docs.title: Personal Portfolio Website & Blog Hosted on EC2 Instance – https://jovangash.com
